plot: Walter makes a desperate move to protect himself, setting off a chain of events that will change everything. Meanwhile, Jesse is forced to make an impossible choice.

In the aftermath of killing the drug dealers, Walt has a tense meeting with Gus who makes it quite clear that his patience has reached its limit. Walt professes not to know the whereabouts of Jesse who he claims has fled the State. Gus chooses Walt's new assistant, who turns out to be Gale. Walt knows that as long as he's the only cook available, Gus will have to keep him alive...—garykmcd
